clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Dasabuvir in combination with DB09296 DB09297 and DB00503 as Viekira Pak is indicated for the treatment of patients with HCV genotype 1a with DB00811 or genotype 1b without DB00811 including those with compensated cirrhosis FDA Label

contraindications.disease: The most common adverse effects of Viekira Pak either in combination with or without DB00811 were pruritus nausea insomnia and asthenia FDA Label
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Dasabuvir is classified as a direct acting antiviral DAA and prevents viral replication in HCV genotype 1 FDA Label

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Dasabuvir can be increased when it is combined with Ranolazine
